Package com.example.lotteryevent.repository

Class AvailableEventsRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.example.lotteryevent.repository.AvailableEventsRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAvailableEventsRepository
public class AvailableEventsRepositoryImpl extends Object implements IAvailableEventsRepository
This class implements IAvailableEventsRepository. This class gets all available events in the db.
